Unfinished projects
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Unfinished projects
By Infernus on Thursday, September 23, 2004 - 04:23 pm:

This is sort of a last chance call. If any of you have just been doing diddly squat, wasting space in the Cafe, thinking to yourself "What can I do to help?", this is it.

Small Projects: These projects have been pretty much completed but have some holes, or they really aren't that big.

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Monster Trait Lists

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Training Gadgets & Ranch Upgrades

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Rank and combing

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Battle effects

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Combination (Team) Moves

Medium Projects: You can still just play leisurely with these as you could with the small projects, but they're going to take more time than the others.

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Tourney Opponents & Their Stats

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Documents and what they say

Larger Projects: You'll need some time to do these, but hey, it's worth it!

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Lifespans

Unstarted: What temperments go well with each other. I don't think we should start this until the other things are completed, then we'll worry about it.

Ongoing: These will never really be done.

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Temporary Thread for Monsters that start with extra techs

I'm going to leave this thread open in case anyone has anything I missed that needs to be done, or has any questions. Remember that in most of the things I listed above, they do have references to Misc Q&A topics. If you have information to post, do it there.

If it gets ridiculous though, it's getting locked.

Nope, I sure didn't. Ranch sizes deals with ranch upgrades, so that's where it goes. Small project. Only two things are needed. Anyone just starting out gets one right there, or if you haven't gotten the third, you can get that one. Simply put, anyone just starting out could get it in one or two days. Possibly three.

By Raistlin_Majere on Sunday, April 15, 2007 - 04:42 am:

infernus which of these researches are already done ??? specially on the small and medium projects

By Infernus on Sunday, April 15, 2007 - 12:48 pm:

Trait List is technically complete, with one minor thing missing, that being the levels Apes learn their searches at (which I assume is the same as Garu). Some items that give traits might be missing, as well as some traits themselves, but that is unlikely.

Training Gadgets and Ranch Upgrades could be called complete, unless those fullness areas on the two where it's unlisted need entries (not to worry as I have those gadgets). Unless there's any gadgets we're missing, nothing else there is needed.

The Rank and Combining project isn't complete. Nothing was ever made official, and there may be requirements we haven't figured out.

Battle Effects is incomplete.

Combination moves is incomplete.

Both medium projects are incomplete. The documents one could honestly be classified as a larger project, and is more important than the tourney opponents one.

The lifespans project will be complete as far as pure breeds go once I finish up the monsters I have on my ranch and update, but quite a few specials still need to be done.

Seeing as I've been around lately, I really should schedule in the time to do some updates and cleaning...
